name: FleeTing
description:
Move higher and higher, passing destructive areas on the way! Change the direction of your character with a single button on the screen, do not forget to collect power-ups that will help you in the game!
Get ready to take on the almost impossible challenge in Fleeting. Bring your skills to perfection, avoiding dangers and find a way to get to the top of the maze!
Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours!
